reporter_caption.center: STATE EX REL. LUCAJ v. CRAIG, 84 Ohio St.3d 1481 (1999)

caption.center: State ex rel. Lucaj v. Craig.

opinion.opinion_text:
In Mandamus.
On motion to dismiss. Motion to dismiss sustained. Cause dismissed.
MOYER, C.J., DOUGLAS, RESNICK, F.E. SWEENEY, PFEIFER, COOK and LUNDBERG STRATTON, JJ., concur.
